data: OB AMB Induction and Cervical Ripening with Prostaglandin (Multiphase)
Nurse to initiate the First Induction phase of this PowerPlan
Refer to Society of Obstetricians and Gynaecologists of Canada (SOGC) Clinical Practice Guideline Induction of Labour
Discharge after one hour of electronic fetal monitoring if: woman is not in active labour, discharge instructions given, and non-stress test is normal
Routine, Reason: Pre Cervical Ripening Assessment, once
Assess q15min for 1 hour post administration of prostaglandin
Continuous for 1 hour post administration of prostaglandin
No Exceptions, for 1 hour post administration of prostaglandin
Prostaglandin should not be used in the setting of trial of labour after cesarean section in the third trimester with a live fetus (risk of uterine rupture)
10 mg, vaginal, once, drug form: insert
1 application, vaginal, once, drug form: gel
1 application, vaginal, once, drug form: gel
1 spray, sublingual, as directed, PRN other (see comment), drug form: spray
Do not start oxytocin induction for at least 30 minutes after removal of the last dinoprostone vaginal insert (CERVIDIL)
Do not start oxytocin induction for at least 6 hours after dinoprostone gel administration
Nurse to initiate the Second Induction phase of this PowerPlan
Refer to Society of Obstetricians and Gynaecologists of Canada (SOGC) Clinical Practice Guideline Induction of Labour
Discharge after one hour of electronic fetal monitoring if: woman is not in active labour, discharge instructions given, and non-stress test is normal
Nurse to discontinue the First Induction phase of this PowerPlan if applicable
Routine, Reason: Pre Cervical Ripening Assessment, once
Ensure previously inserted dinoprostone vaginal insert (CERVIDIL) has been removed
Assess q15min for 1 hour post administration of prostaglandin
Continuous for 1 hour post administration of prostaglandin
No Exceptions, for 1 hour post administration of prostaglandin
Prostaglandin should not be used in the setting of trial of labour after cesarean section in the third trimester with a live fetus (risk of uterine rupture)
10 mg, vaginal, once, drug form: insert
1 application, vaginal, once, drug form: gel
1 application, vaginal, once, drug form: gel
1 spray, sublingual, as directed, PRN other (see comment), drug form: spray
Do not start oxytocin induction for at least 30 minutes after removal of the last dinoprostone vaginal insert (CERVIDIL)
Do not start oxytocin induction for at least 6 hours after dinoprostone gel administration
